name: Hyperdevotion Noire: Goddess Black Heart
description:
Dive into the world of Gamarket, where for the first time ever in the Hyperdimension Neptunia series, battle takes the form of a strategy RPG! Gather an army of new allies to fight through maps laden with laser beams, flame pits, and more. Build up Lily Rank between characters to deal massive amounts of damage because being chibi doesn’t mean damage dealt has to be teeny! But watch out for those status ailments or you might just be tofu! (Literally).

Key Features:
1. Fight in a whole new way, taking on enemies on a strategy RPG battlefield!
2. A raft of new playable characters joins the CPUs, each representing popular game series!
3. Increase the bond between characters in battle with the Lily System and watch your damage output skyrocket!
4. Take a break with the “Sim Noire” mode, where you can buy furniture and accessories with in-game points and unlock extra scenes!

Some functions and features may not be available on PlayStation TV.

1 player(s)
2976KB Minimum
Touchscreen
